features.title: Member Management
features.content: Members can easily register, update their profiles, set fitness goals, and monitor their progress over time. The system also allows seamless renewal of subscription plans, ensuring uninterrupted access to services.

features.title: Membership Plans
features.content: The platform offers a variety of membership plans with customizable pricing, duration, and access levels. This flexibility allows gyms to cater to diverse client needs and improve member retention.

features.title: Check-In/Check-Out System
features.content: A biometric fingerprint-based system enables quick and secure member check-ins and check-outs, providing accurate attendance tracking and enhancing overall security.

features.title: Class Scheduling and Booking
features.content: Members can view available fitness classes and book slots in real-time. The scheduling feature helps avoid overbooking and allows trainers to manage their timetables efficiently.

features.title: Trainer Management
features.content: Administrators can maintain detailed records of trainers, including experience, assigned clients, and performance metrics. This feature helps optimize staff allocation and improve service quality.

features.title: Integrated Payment System
features.content: The system supports secure payment processing and automatically sends confirmation receipts to members via email or SMS. It ensures a smooth transaction experience and keeps records organized.

features.title: Reports and Analytics
features.content: Generate insightful reports on member health progress, attendance, and gym revenue. These analytics support data-driven decisions for better management and growth planning.

features.title: Personalized Fitness Plans
features.content: Based on member profiles, BMI, and specific health conditions, the system can automatically generate tailored workout and nutrition plans to suit individual goals and capabilities.

features.title: Injury Management
features.content: Members with injuries can be assigned customized, lighter training routines. Access to certain equipment or sessions can be restricted to ensure safe recovery and prevent further harm.
